properties.areaDesc: Waters from Pigeon Point to Point Pinos 10-60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 14 at 2:43PM PST until January 15 at 9:00PM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, south winds 20 to 30 kt with
gusts up to 40 kt and seas 10 to 12 feet at 13 seconds
expected. For the Small Craft Advisory, seas around 10 feet at
14 seconds expected.

* WHERE...Waters from Pigeon Point to Point Pinos 10-60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 3 AM to 9 AM PST Thursday.
For the Small Craft Advisory, until 9 PM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM PST THURSDAY
